game.name: The Haunted Loop
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Trapped in a nightmare hallway. Spot the difference to survive. Featuring over 100 randomized anomalies and a hidden Brutal Mode. Consult the mysterious Tomes to escape, but choose wisely: the hall is listening, and it may not like what you do.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Trapped in a nightmare hallway. Spot the difference to survive. Featuring over 100 randomized anomalies and a hidden Brutal Mode. Consult the mysterious Tomes to escape, but choose wisely: the hall is listening, and it may not like what you do.
